Workdone:
Great Italian video...didnt do so much.. but adjust the saturation, levels, lower the contrast. Could of done alot more to it... but I wanted to get this out as soon as I can.

Audio:
Got some cam audio from a good friend.... but it had issues like most cam's. Took around 2 hours getting it all the EQ bands adjusted and sync. Check Sample

THC CAM RATING:
V8 A5.5
